messages.subject: Educational movies
messages.msgSnippet: If they let you rent DVDs for free, that is if you have a DVD player these are great.  They all most all have this wonderful commentary about the move.  We
messages.messageBody:
If they let you rent DVDs for free, that is if you have a DVD player
these are great. They all most all have this wonderful commentary
about the move. We love to see where and how the move was done.
Very educational. Kevin Costner in Dances With Wolves goes through
the entire move with commentary, do not try to watch the movie and
this all in one day! :)

Stephanie H. in NY

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 487

<< any educational videos with kevin costner in
them?only kidding.. >>

How about Al Pacino. Yum! Hey- since we are unschoolers, just about
anything could be considered educational!


*** KiM ***
runs with scissors
